P.title: What is the probability that a woman will be elected as the President of the United States between 2024 and 2030?
P.body:
Resolution criteria: This question will resolve as Yes if, between January 20, 2025, and January 20, 2031, a woman is inaugurated as the President of the United States. The resolution will be based on the official confirmation of the election results by the United States Electoral College and the subsequent inauguration of the elected individual as President. The individual must identify as a woman and be recognized as such by authoritative media sources. In the event of a dispute over the election results, the question will resolve based on the final decision by the relevant legal authority, such as the Supreme Court of the United States, if applicable. If a woman assumes the presidency through succession, impeachment, or any other means other than being elected and inaugurated for a new term within the specified timeframe, this will not satisfy the resolution criteria.

In the case that the inauguration date is officially changed, the resolution timeframe will be adjusted accordingly. If no woman is inaugurated as President during the specified timeframe, the question will resolve as No.

Q_and_not_P.title: Will Narendra Modi still be the Prime Minister of India on January 1, 2030, AND no woman be elected as the President of the United States between 2024 and 2030?
Q_and_not_P.body:
Resolution criteria: This question will resolve as Yes if both of the following conditions are met: Narendra Modi is serving as the Prime Minister of India on January 1, 2030, based on official announcements from the Government of India or credible news reports, AND between January 20, 2025, and January 20, 2031, a woman is not inaugurated as the President of the United States, based on the official confirmation of the election results by the United States Electoral College and the subsequent inauguration of the elected individual as President. The question will resolve as No if either of these conditions is not met.

Edge cases for Narendra Modi's status as Prime Minister will be considered as outlined in the original question. For the United States presidency, if a woman assumes the presidency through succession, impeachment, or any other means other than being elected and inaugurated for a new term within the specified timeframe, this will not satisfy the resolution criteria for the second condition.

P_or_Q.title: Will either of the following occur: (a) a woman is elected as the President of the United States between 2024 and 2030, or (b) Narendra Modi will still be the Prime Minister of India on January 1, 2030?
P_or_Q.body: Resolves YES if either of the said events occur (or both). Resolves NO otherwise.

P.title: What is the probability that a woman will be elected as the President of the United States between 2024 and 2030?
P.body:
Resolution criteria: This question will resolve as Yes if, between January 20, 2025, and January 20, 2031, a woman is inaugurated as the President of the United States. The resolution will be based on the official confirmation of the election results by the United States Electoral College and the subsequent inauguration of the elected individual as President. The individual must identify as a woman and be recognized as such by authoritative media sources. In the event of a dispute over the election results, the question will resolve based on the final decision by the relevant legal authority, such as the Supreme Court of the United States, if applicable. If a woman assumes the presidency through succession, impeachment, or any other means other than being elected and inaugurated for a new term within the specified timeframe, this will not satisfy the resolution criteria.

In the case that the inauguration date is officially changed, the resolution timeframe will be adjusted accordingly. If no woman is inaugurated as President during the specified timeframe, the question will resolve as No.

Q_and_not_P.title: Will Xi Jinping remain the President of China until 2030 AND no woman be elected as the President of the United States between 2024 and 2030?
Q_and_not_P.body:
Resolution criteria: This question will resolve as Yes if both of the following conditions are met: 

1. Xi Jinping holds the title of President of the People's Republic of China continuously from the date of the question's posting until December 31, 2030, based on official announcements from the Chinese government or state-controlled media, as well as international recognition of the political status of the Chinese presidency.

2. Between January 20, 2025, and January 20, 2031, a woman is not inaugurated as the President of the United States, based on the official confirmation of the election results by the United States Electoral College and the subsequent inauguration of the elected individual as President.

The question will resolve as No if either Xi Jinping does not remain President of China until the specified date or if a woman is elected and inaugurated as President of the United States within the specified timeframe. Temporary incapacitation or delegation of duties without formal relinquishment of the title of President for Xi Jinping, or a woman assuming the presidency through succession, impeachment, or any other means other than being elected and inaugurated for a new term for the US presidency, will not affect the resolution criteria as specified for each condition.

P_or_Q.title: Will either of the following occur: (a) a woman is elected as the President of the United States between 2024 and 2030, or (b) Xi Jinping remains the President of China until 2030?
P_or_Q.body: Resolves YES if either of the specified events occur (or both). Resolves NO otherwise.

P.body:
Resolution criteria: This question will resolve as Yes if, between January 20, 2025, and January 20, 2031, a woman is inaugurated as the President of the United States. The resolution will be based on the official confirmation of the election results by the United States Electoral College and the subsequent inauguration of the elected individual as President. The individual must identify as a woman and be recognized as such by authoritative media sources. Q_and_not_P.title: What is the probability that France's GDP will increase by more than 3% annually between 2024 and 2030 AND a woman will not be elected as the President of the United States between 2024 and 2030?
Q_and_not_P.body: This question will resolve as YES if both of the following conditions are met: 1) The annual Gross Domestic Product (GDP) growth rate of France, as reported by the World Bank or the National Institute of Statistics and Economic Studies (INSEE), increases by more than 3% per annum for each year between January 1, 2024, and December 31, 2030, without rounding, and 2) between January 20, 2025, and January 20, 2031, a woman is not inaugurated as the President of the United States. The resolution will be based on the official confirmation of the election results by the United States Electoral College and the subsequent inauguration of the elected individual as President. The question will resolve as NO if either of these conditions is not met. The detailed resolution criteria for each condition are as specified in the individual questions.

P_or_Q.title: What is the probability that either of the following will occur: (a) a woman is elected as the President of the United States between 2024 and 2030, or (b) France's Gross Domestic Product will increase by more than 3% annually between 2024 and 2030?
P_or_Q.body: Resolves YES if either of the specified events occur (or both). Resolves NO otherwise.

P.title: What is the probability that a woman will be elected as the President of the United States between 2024 and 2030?
P.body:
Resolution criteria: This question will resolve as Yes if, between January 20, 2025, and January 20, 2031, a woman is inaugurated as the President of the United States. The resolution will be based on the official confirmation of the election results by the United States Electoral College and the subsequent inauguration of the elected individual as President. The individual must identify as a woman and be recognized as such by authoritative media sources. In the event of a dispute over the election results, the question will resolve based on the final decision by the relevant legal authority, such as the Supreme Court of the United States, if applicable. If a woman assumes the presidency through succession, impeachment, or any other means other than being elected and inaugurated for a new term within the specified timeframe, this will not satisfy the resolution criteria.

In the case that the inauguration date is officially changed, the resolution timeframe will be adjusted accordingly. If no woman is inaugurated as President during the specified timeframe, the question will resolve as No.

Q_and_not_P.title: What is the probability that Italy's Gross Domestic Product will increase by more than 3% between 2024 and 2030 AND a woman will not be elected as the President of the United States between 2024 and 2030?
Q_and_not_P.body: Resolution criteria: This question will resolve as Yes if both of the following conditions are met: 1) The Gross Domestic Product (GDP) of Italy, as reported by the International Monetary Fund (IMF) or an equivalent authoritative economic body, shows an increase of more than 3% in real terms (adjusted for inflation) between the fiscal year ending in 2024 and the fiscal year ending in 2030, based on the final revised numbers and not preliminary estimates, and 2) between January 20, 2025, and January 20, 2031, a woman is not inaugurated as the President of the United States, based on the official confirmation of the election results by the United States Electoral College and the subsequent inauguration of the elected individual as President. The resolution will be No if either of these conditions is not met. The percentage increase for Italy's GDP will be calculated using the specified formula, and the resolution regarding the election of a woman as President of the United States will be based on the criteria outlined in the original question. If either condition resolves as N/A (not applicable) or if the necessary data is not available by the resolution date, the question will resolve as No.

P_or_Q.title: Will either of the following occur: (a) a woman is elected as the President of the United States between 2024 and 2030, or (b) Italy's Gross Domestic Product increases by more than 3% between 2024 and 2030?
P_or_Q.body: Resolves YES if either of the stated events occur (or both). Resolves NO otherwise.

P.title: What is the probability that a woman will be elected as the President of the United States between 2024 and 2030?
P.body:
Resolution criteria: This question will resolve as Yes if, between January 20, 2025, and January 20, 2031, a woman is inaugurated as the President of the United States. The resolution will be based on the official confirmation of the election results by the United States Electoral College and the subsequent inauguration of the elected individual as President. The individual must identify as a woman and be recognized as such by authoritative media sources. In the event of a dispute over the election results, the question will resolve based on the final decision by the relevant legal authority, such as the Supreme Court of the United States, if applicable. If a woman assumes the presidency through succession, impeachment, or any other means other than being elected and inaugurated for a new term within the specified timeframe, this will not satisfy the resolution criteria.

In the case that the inauguration date is officially changed, the resolution timeframe will be adjusted accordingly. If no woman is inaugurated as President during the specified timeframe, the question will resolve as No.

Q_and_not_P.title: What is the probability that Germany's GDP will increase by at least 3% annually between 2024 and 2030 AND that a woman will not be elected as the President of the United States between 2024 and 2030?
Q_and_not_P.body: Resolution criteria: This question will resolve as Yes if both of the following conditions are met: 1) The Federal Statistical Office of Germany (Destatis) reports that the annual Gross Domestic Product (GDP) growth rate for Germany has met or exceeded 3% for each year from 2024 through 2030, measured in real terms, adjusted for inflation, and based on the year-over-year percentage change in GDP, according to the initial official release of the GDP data for each year, without considering subsequent revisions, and 2) Between January 20, 2025, and January 20, 2031, a woman is not inaugurated as the President of the United States, based on the official confirmation of the election results by the United States Electoral College and the subsequent inauguration of the elected individual as President. The resolution will be based on the most comparable official data or estimates provided by a recognized international economic organization, such as the International Monetary Fund (IMF) or the Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development (OECD), if Destatis discontinues reporting, is unable to report, or significantly changes its methodology for calculating GDP. If Germany undergoes a change that makes it no longer a distinct economic entity, or if the required data is not released by the resolution date, the question will resolve as No for the GDP condition. For the presidential condition, if a woman assumes the presidency through succession, impeachment, or any other means other than being elected and inaugurated for a new term within the specified timeframe, this will not satisfy the resolution criteria. The question will resolve as No if either of the conditions is not met.

P_or_Q.title: Will either of the following occur: (a) a woman is elected as the President of the United States between 2024 and 2030, or (b) Germany's Gross Domestic Product increases by at least 3% annually between 2024 and 2030?
P_or_Q.body: Resolves YES if either of the specified events occur (or both). Resolves NO otherwise.

P.title: What is the probability that a woman will be elected as the President of the United States between 2024 and 2030?
P.body:
Resolution criteria: This question will resolve as Yes if, between January 20, 2025, and January 20, 2031, a woman is inaugurated as the President of the United States. The resolution will be based on the official confirmation of the election results by the United States Electoral College and the subsequent inauguration of the elected individual as President. The individual must identify as a woman and be recognized as such by authoritative media sources. Q_and_not_P.title: Will Angela Merkel no longer be the Chancellor of Germany by the end of 2028 AND a woman not be elected as the President of the United States between 2024 and 2030?
Q_and_not_P.body:
Resolution criteria: This question will resolve as Yes if both of the following conditions are met:

1. Angela Merkel is not serving as the Chancellor of Germany at any point from the time of the question's posting until December 31, 2028, based on official statements from the German Federal Government or credible news reports from internationally recognized media outlets.

2. Between January 20, 2025, and January 20, 2031, a woman is not inaugurated as the President of the United States, based on the official confirmation of the election results by the United States Electoral College and the subsequent inauguration of the elected individual as President.

The question will resolve as No if either Angela Merkel is still serving as the Chancellor of Germany at the end of 2028 or if a woman is elected and inaugurated as the President of the United States within the specified timeframe. The resolution will be based on the criteria outlined in the individual questions for Angela Merkel's chancellorship and the election of a woman as the President of the United States.

P_or_Q.title: Will either of the following occur: (a) a woman is elected as the President of the United States between 2024 and 2030, or (b) Angela Merkel is no longer the Chancellor of Germany by the end of 2028?
P_or_Q.body: Resolves YES if either of the specified events occur (or both). Resolves NO otherwise.

P.title: What is the probability that a woman will be elected as the President of the United States between 2024 and 2030?
P.body:
Resolution criteria: This question will resolve as Yes if, between January 20, 2025, and January 20, 2031, a woman is inaugurated as the President of the United States. The resolution will be based on the official confirmation of the election results by the United States Electoral College and the subsequent inauguration of the elected individual as President. The individual must identify as a woman and be recognized as such by authoritative media sources. In the event of a dispute over the election results, the question will resolve based on the final decision by the relevant legal authority, such as the Supreme Court of the United States, if applicable. If a woman assumes the presidency through succession, impeachment, or any other means other than being elected and inaugurated for a new term within the specified timeframe, this will not satisfy the resolution criteria.

In the case that the inauguration date is officially changed, the resolution timeframe will be adjusted accordingly. If no woman is inaugurated as President during the specified timeframe, the question will resolve as No.

Q_and_not_P.title: Will the UK have a new Prime Minister by January 1, 2028, AND will a woman not be elected as the President of the United States between 2024 and 2030?
Q_and_not_P.body: Resolution criteria: This question will resolve as YES if both of the following conditions are met: 1) A person other than the individual holding the office of Prime Minister of the United Kingdom as of [the date the question was posed] takes office as the new Prime Minister before January 1, 2028, with the change in leadership being officially recognized by the UK government and the individual formally appointed and serving as Prime Minister (interim or acting Prime Ministers do not count unless officially appointed without the interim or acting qualifier), and 2) Between January 20, 2025, and January 20, 2031, a woman is not inaugurated as the President of the United States, with the resolution based on the official confirmation of the election results by the United States Electoral College and the subsequent inauguration of the elected individual as President. The question will resolve as NO if either of these conditions is not met. Interim or acting Prime Ministers or Presidents will not satisfy the resolution criteria unless they are officially appointed without the interim or acting qualifier. In the event of a dispute or ambiguity regarding the legitimacy of the appointments, the resolution will be based on the recognition of the individual's authority by the relevant governing bodies (UK Civil Service and Parliament for the Prime Minister, and the relevant legal authority such as the Supreme Court for the US President). If the UK ceases to exist as a sovereign nation or undergoes a significant change in its system of government such that the role of Prime Minister is fundamentally altered or abolished, or if the inauguration date in the US is officially changed, the question will resolve as N/A (not applicable).

P_or_Q.title: Will either of the following occur: (a) a woman is elected as the President of the United States between 2024 and 2030, or (b) the United Kingdom has a new Prime Minister by January 1, 2028?
P_or_Q.body: Resolves YES if either of the specified events occur (or both). Resolves NO otherwise.

P.title: What is the probability that a woman will be elected as the President of the United States between 2024 and 2030?
P.body:
Resolution criteria: This question will resolve as Yes if, between January 20, 2025, and January 20, 2031, a woman is inaugurated as the President of the United States. The resolution will be based on the official confirmation of the election results by the United States Electoral College and the subsequent inauguration of the elected individual as President. The individual must identify as a woman and be recognized as such by authoritative media sources. In the event of a dispute over the election results, the question will resolve based on the final decision by the relevant legal authority, such as the Supreme Court of the United States, if applicable. If a woman assumes the presidency through succession, impeachment, or any other means other than being elected and inaugurated for a new term within the specified timeframe, this will not satisfy the resolution criteria.

In the case that the inauguration date is officially changed, the resolution timeframe will be adjusted accordingly. If no woman is inaugurated as President during the specified timeframe, the question will resolve as No.

Q_and_not_P.title: What is the probability that Matteo Renzi will become the Prime Minister of Italy AND a woman will not be elected as the President of the United States between 2024 and 2030?
Q_and_not_P.body: Resolution criteria: This question will resolve as Yes if both of the following conditions are met: Matteo Renzi is appointed and serves as the Prime Minister of Italy at any point between January 1, 2024, and December 31, 2030, AND a woman is not inaugurated as the President of the United States between January 20, 2025, and January 20, 2031. The resolution for Matteo Renzi becoming Prime Minister will be based on official announcements from the Italian government or credible reports from major international news organizations. The resolution for a woman not being elected as President of the United States will be based on the official confirmation of the election results by the United States Electoral College and the subsequent inauguration of the elected individual as President. Interim or caretaker roles for the Prime Minister of Italy will count only if Matteo Renzi is formally given the title of Prime Minister. The individual elected as President of the United States must not identify as a woman and be recognized as such by authoritative media sources. In the event of disputes or ambiguity regarding the official status of either position, statements from the President of Italy or the Italian Constitutional Court, and the final decision by the relevant legal authority in the United States, such as the Supreme Court, will be considered definitive. If Matteo Renzi passes away or publicly announces that he will not seek or accept the position of Prime Minister before December 31, 2030, or if a woman is inaugurated as President of the United States within the specified timeframe, the question will resolve as No.

P_or_Q.title: Will either of the following occur: (a) a woman is elected as the President of the United States between 2024 and 2030, or (b) Matteo Renzi becomes the Prime Minister of Italy between 2024 and 2030?
P_or_Q.body: Resolves YES if either of the specified events occur (or both). Resolves NO otherwise.

P.title: What is the probability that a woman will be elected as the President of the United States between 2024 and 2030?
P.body:
Resolution criteria: This question will resolve as Yes if, between January 20, 2025, and January 20, 2031, a woman is inaugurated as the President of the United States. The resolution will be based on the official confirmation of the election results by the United States Electoral College and the subsequent inauguration of the elected individual as President. The individual must identify as a woman and be recognized as such by authoritative media sources. In the event of a dispute over the election results, the question will resolve based on the final decision by the relevant legal authority, such as the Supreme Court of the United States, if applicable. If a woman assumes the presidency through succession, impeachment, or any other means other than being elected and inaugurated for a new term within the specified timeframe, this will not satisfy the resolution criteria.

In the case that the inauguration date is officially changed, the resolution timeframe will be adjusted accordingly. If no woman is inaugurated as President during the specified timeframe, the question will resolve as No.

Q_and_not_P.title: What is the probability that the GDP of the United States will increase by more than 3% between 2024 and 2030 AND that a woman will not be elected as the President of the United States between 2024 and 2030?
Q_and_not_P.body:
This question will resolve as YES if both of the following conditions are met: 

1. The real Gross Domestic Product (GDP) of the United States, as reported by the Bureau of Economic Analysis (BEA) or its successor agency, increases by more than 3% in total between the fourth quarter of 2024 and the fourth quarter of 2030, adjusted for inflation and based on chained dollars with a reference year that is consistent with the one used by the BEA in 2023. The resolution will be based on the first official release of the relevant data by the BEA after the fourth quarter of 2030. If the BEA has ceased to exist or no longer publishes the relevant data, the resolution will be based on the most authoritative and comparable data source available at the time. In the event of a significant revision of historical GDP data that affects the calculation, the resolution will be based on the revised data. If the relevant data is not released by the resolution date due to unforeseen circumstances, the question will resolve as indeterminate. 

2. Between January 20, 2025, and January 20, 2031, a woman is not inaugurated as the President of the United States. The resolution will be based on the official confirmation of the election results by the United States Electoral College and the subsequent inauguration of the elected individual as President. The individual must identify as a woman and be recognized as such by authoritative media sources. In the event of a dispute over the election results, the question will resolve based on the final decision by the relevant legal authority, such as the Supreme Court of the United States, if applicable. If a woman assumes the presidency through succession, impeachment, or any other means other than being elected and inaugurated for a new term within the specified timeframe, this will not satisfy the resolution criteria. 

The question will resolve as NO if either one of the conditions is not met. If the resolution criteria for both conditions cannot be determined, or if there is a change in the methodology or circumstances that prevents a clear resolution, the question will resolve as indeterminate.

P_or_Q.title: Will either of the following occur: (a) a woman is elected as the President of the United States between 2024 and 2030, or (b) the Gross Domestic Product (GDP) of the United States increases by more than 3% between 2024 and 2030?
P_or_Q.body: Resolves YES if either of the stated events occur (or both). Resolves NO otherwise.

P.title: What is the probability that a woman will be elected as the President of the United States between 2024 and 2030?
P.body:
Resolution criteria: This question will resolve as Yes if, between January 20, 2025, and January 20, 2031, a woman is inaugurated as the President of the United States. The resolution will be based on the official confirmation of the election results by the United States Electoral College and the subsequent inauguration of the elected individual as President. The individual must identify as a woman and be recognized as such by authoritative media sources. In the event of a dispute over the election results, the question will resolve based on the final decision by the relevant legal authority, such as the Supreme Court of the United States, if applicable. If a woman assumes the presidency through succession, impeachment, or any other means other than being elected and inaugurated for a new term within the specified timeframe, this will not satisfy the resolution criteria.

In the case that the inauguration date is officially changed, the resolution timeframe will be adjusted accordingly. If no woman is inaugurated as President during the specified timeframe, the question will resolve as No.

Q_and_not_P.title: What is the probability that Shinzo Abe will not be re-elected as Prime Minister of Japan in the year 2027 AND a woman will not be elected as the President of the United States between 2024 and 2030?
Q_and_not_P.body: Resolution criteria: This question will resolve as Yes if both of the following conditions are met: Shinzo Abe is not re-elected as the Prime Minister of Japan in a general election or a Liberal Democratic Party (LDP) leadership election, if the LDP is the ruling party, and he is not subsequently appointed as Prime Minister by the Emperor of Japan, on or before December 31, 2027, AND a woman is not inaugurated as the President of the United States between January 20, 2025, and January 20, 2031. The resolution will be based on official announcements from the Japanese government or the LDP for the Japanese Prime Minister election, and the United States Electoral College and subsequent inauguration for the US Presidential election. Interim or acting positions not confirmed by a formal election process will not be considered for resolution of this question. If Shinzo Abe is unable to fulfill the role of Prime Minister due to health reasons, incapacitation, or death prior to the resolution date, or if he is not a candidate in any Prime Ministerial election in Japan in the year 2027, or if the election process in Japan undergoes significant changes that make the terms of this question inapplicable, or if the position of Prime Minister is dissolved or redefined in a way that is not comparable to its status as of the knowledge cutoff date, the question will resolve as No for the Japanese Prime Minister part. For the US Presidential election, if a woman assumes the presidency through succession, impeachment, or any other means other than being elected and inaugurated for a new term within the specified timeframe, this will not satisfy the resolution criteria. In the event of any ambiguity or dispute over the election process or results for either country, the resolution will be based on the official records and announcements from the National Diet of Japan and the LDP for Japan, and the final decision by the relevant legal authority, such as the Supreme Court of the United States, if applicable, for the US. If the inauguration date in the US is officially changed, the resolution timeframe will be adjusted accordingly. If no woman is inaugurated as President during the specified timeframe, the question will resolve as Yes for the US Presidential part.

P_or_Q.title: Will either of the following occur: (a) a woman is elected as the President of the United States between 2024 and 2030, or (b) Shinzo Abe is re-elected as Prime Minister of Japan in the year 2027?
P_or_Q.body: Resolves YES if either of the said events occur (or both). Resolves NO otherwise.
